column4: anyone know how to get mail working between two machines on my network?  Local [Ubuntu Feisty Fawn]  won't send to my server because the domain isn't found, server [debian sarge]  won't send to local because "mailing to remote domains not supported".  Any ideas?
you probably need to configure postfix, that's a book in itself.
I set up a gmail account for my servers to email errors to.  Safer than running my own mail servers.
people used to use something called talk or xtalk for that.
